name: Matsumura Kunihiro Den: Saikyou no Rekishi o Nurikaero!
overview: Kunihiro Matsumura, famous for his impersonations, battles as the "karateka" to face off against seven different opponents. With original style and gameplay, the game uses a parody of fighting moves along with various gag moves such as the Piro Piro and Bow Bow evasion technique.
